name: Bemlo
headline: The platform for managing healthcare staffing and scheduling.
description: Bemlo provides a comprehensive AI-driven staffing solution tailored specifically for the healthcare and social care sectors, with automated scheduling as its cornerstone. The system generates optimal schedules that balance care demands with employee preferences, freeing up valuable time for patient care, enhancing workplace satisfaction, and promoting more efficient collaboration within organizations.

founders.name: Alexander BjÃ¶rkenstam, Founder
founders.description: Hey, Iâ€™m Alex! ðŸ‘‹ I dropped out of my undergraduate Engineering degree to build Bemlo, an end-to-end healthcare marketplace for nurses and doctors to find jobs.

founders.name: Edvin Fernqvist, Founder
founders.description: During the onset of the Corona pandemic I looked for ways to help out and started to source and produce PPE. Coming in contact with the hard pressed nurses and doctors working in ICUs and other facilities I soon found there were other more pressing issues to be solved. When I met my co-founders we decided to band together to create Bemlo and reverse the deteriorating situation we saw in healthcare staffing and recruiting.

# The modern workforce solution for healthcare
Empowering healthcare organizations with an end-to-end, digital, and AI-driven staffing solution. Bemlo replaces emails, texts and spreadsheets with one platform that makes sure your shifts are filled on time and on budget.
[Book a Demo](https://bemlo.com/<https:/calendar.app.google/2FPkMLD9T79zvXCx8>)
![Hero Image](https://bemlo.com/hero-image.png)
### Proudly serving public and private healthcare organizations such as
[![logo-/danderyds-sjukhus.png](https://bemlo.com/_next/image?url=%2Fclients%2Fdanderyds-sjukhus.png&w=640&q=75)Case Study](https://bemlo.com/</case-studies/danderyds-sjukhus>)
![logo-/kungsbacka-kommun.png](https://bemlo.com/_next/image?url=%2Fclients%2Fkungsbacka-kommun.png&w=640&q=75)
![logo-/region-jamtland-harjedalen.png](https://bemlo.com/_next/image?url=%2Fclients%2Fregion-jamtland-harjedalen.png&w=640&q=75)
![logo-/region-norrbotten.png](https://bemlo.com/_next/image?url=%2Fclients%2Fregion-norrbotten.png&w=640&q=75)
![logo-/region-varmland.png](https://bemlo.com/_next/image?url=%2Fclients%2Fregion-varmland.png&w=640&q=75)
[![logo-/region-orebro-lan.png](https://bemlo.com/_next/image?url=%2Fclients%2Fregion-orebro-lan.png&w=640&q=75)Case Study](https://bemlo.com/</case-studies/region-orebro>)
![logo-/region-vasterbotten.png](https://bemlo.com/_next/image?url=%2Fclients%2Fregion-vasterbotten.png&w=640&q=75)
![logo-/tomelilla-kommun.png](https://bemlo.com/_next/image?url=%2Fclients%2Ftomelilla-kommun.png&w=640&q=75)
...and many more
Our Solutions
### Bemlo, Your End-to-End Staffing Solution
#### Delivered as a cloud solution with mobile app for employees, no setup required for your IT team.
Main Features
[AI SchedulingCreate optimized rotas based on care needs and staff availability/preferences.](https://bemlo.com/</product/ai-scheduling>)[PoolsDistribute shifts to hourly employees across units and organizations.](https://bemlo.com/</product/pools>)[Agency ManagementManage and verify external staffing with built-in compliance checks and invoicing integration.](https://bemlo.com/</product/agency-management>)
Supporting Features
Enhanced Communication
Facilitate clear communication between managers, employees, and agencies.
Real-Time Statistics
Gain insights into your staffing situation with our powerful analytics suite.
Advanced Security
Protect personal information with advanced IAM features and Single Sign-On (SSO).
Marketplace Access
Recruit from our marketplace of over 20,000 vetted healthcare professionals.
The Platform
### A platform that ties staffing all together, not just another tool to maintain.
Too often, staffing managers are juggling multiple tools and are stuck in manual processes to maintain safe staffing. Bemlo is the platform that ties everything together.Spreadsheets, phone calls and emails are a thing of the past. Sync your care need and configure scheduling rules; Bemlo will automatically schedule all your staff after their preferences with the help of AI. Remaining shifts are published to your shift bank where pool staff can apply to the vacant shifts and your permanent workforce can pick up extra work.Any unfilled shifts can with a click of a button be escalated to your procured agencies. The control and scheduling of agency staff is done in the same schedule as the permanent staff, no more switching between systems. A platform that ties staffing all together, not just another tool to maintain.
Your Shifts
[Permanent Staff](https://bemlo.com/</product/ai-scheduling>)[Pool Staff](https://bemlo.com/</product/pools>)[Agencies](https://bemlo.com/</product/agency-management>)
Testimonials
### What Our Customers Say
![avatar](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/rpq76rgg/production/a5be957d8057cd525f79501add66b4edaea50870-168x168.png?h=64)![id](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/rpq76rgg/production/9714e75feaa3353b68d3795ab06b02696ba6cefd-158x96.png?h=32)
Danderyds Hospital saves 13,000,000 SEK per year
We manage approximately 46,000 shifts per year, including everything from changes and modifications to existing shifts to new shifts coming in from all units. With Bemloâ€™s system support for the internal pool, we have 75% less administration when it comes to staffing and scheduling our temporary staff.
Tina Trujillo
Former Unit Manager BMC, Danderyds Hospital
[Case Study](https://bemlo.com/</case-studies/danderyds-sjukhus>)
![avatar](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/rpq76rgg/production/d7dd23c4f8d3b64f23879a8bfa8e22f5d9b61c48-168x168.png?h=64)![id](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/rpq76rgg/production/990f66e66fa970d5ad91c56912a97b3eef54b215-262x56.png?h=32)
Region Ã–rebro County implemented the system in less than 4 weeks
In just four weeks, we have successfully implemented Bemlo's procurement system. Now, the entire region is not only up and running but also fully equipped to operate according to the new national agreement and its requirements.
Josefine Elingby
Coordinator of the Recruitment Unit, Region Ã–rebro lÃ¤n
[Case Study](https://bemlo.com/</case-studies/region-orebro>)
![avatar](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/rpq76rgg/production/d137f77eb6a9da0429dd37aa4240b60955645774-168x168.png?h=64)![id](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/rpq76rgg/production/7af81d4b317fbf2d640bc296c1a43ae7cf460158-180x56.png?h=32)
After four months, AbleCare Homes successfully reduced their reliance on staffing agencies by 90%
In addition to helping us reduce our reliance on agencies, an intriguing application of Bemlo has been with our international staff. With Bemlo, international employees can more easily meet their required hours, even during periods when their primary site does not have sufficient hours available.
Sam Hawker
Managing Director, AbleCare Homes
[Case Study](https://bemlo.com/</case-studies/ablecare>)
![Green curly vector](https://bemlo.com/left-curl.svg)
Why Bemlo
### The Benefits of Choosing Bemlo
### 
Increase Retention
Allow your staff to work on their terms, reducing burnout and improving job satisfaction. With AI scheduling, your staff's preferences and well-being are taken into account, resulting in a happier and stronger workforce. Additionally, with Pools, you can offer regular or part-time staff more shifts and complete flexibility without incurring high administrative costs.
### 
Cost Savings
### 
Time Efficiency
### 
Compliance and Accuracy

generated_description:
Bemlo is a dynamic startup founded in 2021, nestled in Stockholm, Sweden, and is an innovative player in the healthcare staffing and scheduling arena. As part of Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch, Bemlo aims to revolutionize how healthcare and social care organizations manage their workforce through a comprehensive, AI-driven platform.

At its core, Bemloâ€™s mission is about streamlining the complex process of staffing and scheduling in healthcare. Their flagship solution replaces the cumbersome use of emails, texts, and spreadsheets, bringing everything into one user-friendly platform. By leveraging AI, Bemlo generates optimal schedules that consider both patient care demands and staff preferences. This means less time fiddling with administrative tasks and more focus on patient care, which ultimately leads to increased staff satisfaction and better collaboration among teams.

With a compact but skilled team of 12, the company offers features like AI Scheduling, shift distribution pools, and agency management, all designed to enhance communication, provide real-time statistics, and ensure compliance. The platform also connects healthcare organizations with a marketplace of over 20,000 vetted professionals, making staffing not just easier but more effective.

Bemlo's impact is already evident with notable public and private healthcare partners. Case studies show significant savingsâ€”like Danderyds Hospital's 13 million SEK reduction in annual staffing costs due to Bemlo's efficiencies. Theyâ€™ve quickly onboarded clients, like Region Ã–rebro County, demonstrating the platform's efficacy and adaptability.

In short, Bemlo isnâ€™t just another health tech tool; itâ€™s a cohesive staffing solution that transforms how organizations approach workforce management. So, if you're in the healthcare sector and looking to cut costs while boosting staff morale, Bemlo's asking you to take a step into the future of staffing. Want to see it in action? You can book a demo on their website: [Bemlo.com](https://bemlo.com).
